summary: The Eliminate Shutdowns Act (S. 2806) aims to prevent government shutdowns by providing for automatic continuing appropriations in the event of a lapse in appropriations. It amends Title 31 of the United States Code to define a 'lapse in appropriations' and establishes a mechanism for funding programs, projects, and activities at the rate provided in the preceding applicable appropriation Acts for renewable 14-day intervals. It also addresses budgetary effects and enforcement of spending limits. The Act takes effect on September 30, 2025.
